System_Overview
[Mining_Protocol_Overview]

Tap Start Mining and let your device do the work. Real-time stats show every hash attempt as your system races to crack the block.

  • No manual interaction required.
  • Uptime equals mining efficiency.
⚠️ Decentralized protocol. Use wisely. DYOR.
[Energy:The_Key_Resource]

Energy is the core resource for mining blocks and earning $FOMO tokens.

  • More Energy = Higher Rewards
  • Increased energy boosts your chances of mining a block.
  • Higher energy also increases the likelihood of earning partial shares.
[Energy_Upgrades]

Boost maximum energy by purchasing Telegram Stars or completing tasks.

  • Common_Tasks: Invite friends, join channels, connect your wallet.
  • Daily_Tasks: Boost channels, refill energy, upgrade energy levels
[Parallel_Mining_Power]

Increase your mining speed by unlocking concurrent hash-compute-units:

  • 4 units: Available instantly for stars.
  • 8 units: Unlock after upgrading to 150,000 energy.
  • 12 units: Unlock after upgrading to 350,000 energy.
  • 24 units: Unlock after upgrading to 500,000 energy.
[Mining_Difficulty_Calculation]

Mining difficulty adjusts dynamically. As more participants join, the probability of getting a reward decreases.

[Energy_Swarm]

The next phase of mining ---> collaborative energy sharing. Exclusively by #fomo_hash team:

  • Mine with the Daily Energy Pool.
  • Unified network boosts efficiency.
  • Rewards: 30% to miners, 70% to energy providers.
  • Support the network and claim rewards.
Reward_Mechanics
Total_$FOMO_supply
1,000,000,000
[Reward_System]
  • 60% of the reward goes to the miner who solves the block.
  • 40% is shared among contributors based on their shares.
Total_blocks_to_be_mined
1,000,000
[Reward_Equality]
  • After every 100,000 blocks the main miner's reward drops by 10%.
  • The shared reward increases by 10%.
  • This continues until the reward reaches a 10% (main miner) / 90% (contributors) split.
